channel.title: Java is not being found. What is wrong? But its installed
channel.description:
Is it because its too new? I downloaded the latest JDK. I think its 1.6.0.10? Edited the compiler in every client I downloaded and they still will not run. Moparscape is the only one that will run. Moparscape is old and buggy so I'd really like to use a new client. Yes I changed my environmental variables.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/6271/java6yx2.png[/img][/URL]
Getting these errors when trying to run the run.bat file
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img380.imageshack.us/img380/9748/javaerrorsaw7.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Java is not being found. What is wrong? But its installed

item.description:
@davedave wrote:

jdk1.6.0_07 for your version.

item.title: Java is not being found. What is wrong? But its installed
item.dc:creator: @Toasty411 Toasty411
item.description:
@Toasty411 wrote:

[quote=“guitars595, post:2, topic:241113”]Right click on runserver.bat or run.bat and edit the jdk part to the version u have. For example say its jdk_1.0_3 or something like that change it to the version you have.[/quote] I already mentioned in my post that I changed it in the compiler.

All the run bat says is

@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
color 0a
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE

Read full topic
